channel.title: [317][317] Looking for a nice CLEAN stable client + source [317][317]
channel.description:
[font=arial black]Hi i have searched the forums over and over looking for a good clean & stable client+source but i cannot seem to find one anywhere.
Basically i want a client+source with the following for a base.[/font]
[u]No customs AT ALL! they look crap
no crappy menus
nice clean source
good combat & pking (doesn't need to be perfect)
No stupid npcs [/u]
Basically i want a source+client like runescape used to be. no god swords or Vesta or anything like that just a nice clean stable source+client with fairly decent combat & pking
Thank you nuxscape
PS-please if you know a decent client+source that basically fits to my requirements post a link or something below!

item.title: [317][317] Looking for a nice CLEAN stable client + source [317][317]

requesting server’s are not allowed, however check this.

item.title: [317][317] Looking for a nice CLEAN stable client + source [317][317]
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

Well… Allstar is ok, but the combat does need a little more updating then it would be great. but caution, it can get very laggy if you mess with it too much. But for no customs and stuff, it should be fine (It has no customs… the original one by mod allstar anyways.)
Here is a link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=416620.0
I dont know about the client though, just find a blank 317/377 client Goodluck coding, allstar brings back some fun memories lol. (When i first started adding customs to a client had a death cape and dragon kite. lol)

Read full topic
